resources.string: Sorry, Could not connect to the Polar device
Your bluetooth interface is down, would you like to turn it on?

This app is a simple app that provides connectivity for Polar heart monitor. 
It only diplays information without complex settings or logging information for jogging. No need to start a session or to record data.



****The Polar device needs to be paired with the phone in android.



 


 Please if you could translate this app on other language it would be really nice! Just fork me on GitHub https://github.com/marcolivierarsenault/PolarHeartRateApplication (Also work if you want to add more features)
